Question: Shenzhen Chestnuter Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Chestnuter Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Digital Signage and Advertising Player

- Main Products: digital signage, advertising player, all in one PC, computer
- Year Established: 2015
- Location: Shenzhen, Guangdong, China
- Annual Revenue: US$5 Million - US$10 Million
- Total Employees: 201 - 300 People
- Business Type: Manufacturer, Trading Company, Distributor/Wholesaler

Shenzhen Chestnuter Technology Co., Ltd specializes in digital signage, advertising players, all-in-one PCs, and computers. Established in 2015, the company operates as a manufacturer, trading company, and distributor/wholesaler, with an annual revenue ranging from US$5 million to US$10 million. Their product range includes various digital signage and advertising display solutions, catering to different commercial and consumer needs.
Summary_cn:
深圳栗子科技有限公司

产品：数码标牌和广告播放器

- 主要产品：数码标牌、广告播放器、一体机电脑、电脑
- 成立年份：2015年
- 地点：中国广东深圳
- 年收入：500万美元 - 1000万美元
- 员工总数：201 - 300人
- 业务类型：制造商、贸易公司、分销商/批发商

深圳栗子科技有限公司专业从事数码标牌、广告播放器、一体机电脑和电脑产品。公司成立于2015年，经营类型包括制造商、贸易公司和分销商/批发商，年收入在500万美元至1000万美元之间。他们的产品范围包括各种数码标牌和广告显示解决方案，满足不同的商业和消费需求。
